NoPermission: <color=#e3e3e3>You do not have permission to use this command</color>
AddAlreadyExists: <color=#e3e3e3>This sound already exists. </color><color=#e3e3e3>Please add <color=#de8732>overwrite</color> to your arguments to allow overwriting an existing sound.</color><color=#e3e3e3>Ex: <color=#de8732>sl add {{0}} overwrite</color></color>
PlayInvalidSyntax: <color=#e3e3e3>Invalid Syntax. Ex: <color=#de8732>/sl play soundname</color> - to play the sound with the given name.</color>
HelpText:
<color=#e3e3e3>Allows players to record sound that can be played back to a player
<color=#de8732>/sl add soundname</color> - to start the creation of a new sound.
<color=#de8732>/sl npc add hookActionType fileName</color> - to add one or more filenames to a human npc (hook action types are: <color=#de8732>OnUseNPC/OnEnterNPC/OnLeaveNPC/OnHitNPC</color>)
<color=#de8732>/sl npc remove hookActionType fileName</color> - to remove a filename from a human npc (hook action types are: <color=#de8732>OnUseNPC/OnEnterNPC/OnLeaveNPC/OnHitNPC</color>)
<color=#de8732>/sl save</color> - to save your recorded sound.
<color=#de8732>/sl reset</color> - to clear your current recording.
<color=#de8732>/sl cancel</color> - to cancel your recording and not save.
<color=#de8732>/sl play</color> - to player your current recording back to you.
<color=#de8732>/sl</color> - to view this help text again.</color>
AudioMessagesHelpText:
<color=#e3e3e3><color=#66B2FF>/audio send playerName audioName</color> - Sends an audio message to a player</color>
<color=#e3e3e3><color=#66B2FF>/audio sendall audioName</color> - Sends an audio message to everyone on the server
<color=#e3e3e3><color=#66B2FF>/audio sendlooped playerName audioName 2 (loop times amount)</color> - Sends a looped audio message to a player
<color=#e3e3e3><color=#66B2FF>/audio sendalllooped audioName 2 (loop times amount)</color> - Sends a looped audio message to everyone on the server
<color=#e3e3e3><color=#66B2FF>/audio files</color> - Shows a list of all audio files on the server
<color=#e3e3e3><color=#66B2FF>/sl</color> - Shows the help page for the Sound Library API
<color=#e3e3e3><color=#66B2FF>/audio help</color> - Shows these help messages
PlayingText: <color=#e3e3e3>Playing the file with the name of <color=#de8732>{0}</color></color>
PlayingAudioMessageText: <color=#e3e3e3>Playing the file with the name of <color=#66B2FF>{0}</color></color>
NullFileName: <color=#e3e3e3>This file name is null, use /audio files</color>
